body:
Hi Dave,


You should apply the skyfunc modifier to the colorpict. Skyfunc is 
produced by gensky.  You can combine everything as follows:


!gensky 4 1 +12.00 -i -a 42.44 -o -76.5 -m 300


skyfunc colorpict sky_map
7       red green blue midday.pic  skymap.cal map_u map_v
0
1	.5


sky_map glow sky_mat
0
0
4  1 1 1 0


sky_mat source sky
0
0
4  0 0 1 180


NOTE that you should probably also add a ground glow as follows:


skyfunc glow ground_glow
0
0
4 1 1 1 0


ground_glow source ground
0
0
4 0 0 -1 180


Regards,


-Jack de Valpine
